attributes.action: look into the education system and make sure that students who graduated with a 2:2 degree does not get discriminated against and has some sort of a chance to gain employment with large and successful companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that students who have graduated with a 2:2 or lower second class degree have nearly no chance or hardly any chance of being employed by large firms. I believe that this is unfair as it seems that firms do not even look at your academic or work history if you have gained a 2:2 and your application is deemed unsuccessful. There are a few cases where students with a 2:2 have got o.k jobs, but this is minimal. I would like the PM or Education minister to have a look into this and ratify if necessary. It seems that more than 90% of companies want a minimum 2:1 or 1st in order for applicants to apply for available vacancies.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
